channel.title: CVE Feed for node-saml -- passport-saml
channel.description: The latest CVEs for node-saml -- passport-saml

item.title: CVE-2021-39171|2024-08-04T01:58:18.150Z -- node-saml -- passport-saml
item.description: Passport-SAML is a SAML 2.0 authentication provider for Passport, the Node.js authentication library. Prior to version 3.1.0, a malicious SAML payload can require transforms that consume significant system resources to process, thereby resulting in reduced or denied service. This would be an effective way to perform a denial-of-service attack. This has been resolved in version 3.1.0. The resolution is to limit the number of allowable transforms to 2.
